mapper.select: select p.*,a.title as auction_title,a.address as auction_address, a.time_range as auction_time_range, (select count(*) from paimai_goods_offers go where go.performance_id=p.id) as offer_count, (select count(*) from paimai_goods_views gv where gv.performance_id=p.id) as view_count, (select count(*) from paimai_goods_follows gf where gf.performance_id=p.id) as follow_count, (select count(*) from paimai_goods g where g.performance_id=p.id) as goods_count, (select count(*) from paimai_goods_deposits gd where gd.performance_id=p.id and gd.status > 0) as deposit_count from paimai_performances p left join paimai_auctions a on a.id=p.auction_id where p.id = #{id}
